group_1.narration: "Yes, it's surely a curse…@Ahh, the Spirit Arts, was it?@Rumor says she excels at it, but…@that's not where her power comes from."
"Her power is a cursed one…@Yes, that girl is the child of a Cursed God."
"All of us believe…that someday that girl@will bring a calamity upon us…@If she wasn't the keeper's granddaughter,@we would have cast her out…"
"You shouldn't get too close to her…@That girl is the child of a Cursed God…@She isn't human."

group_1.textLeft: …The child of a Cursed God, huh?@I thought it was just a rumor…

group_1.textRight: But if everyone says it, then it might be true.
It seems that the curse within her emerges@from time to time…

group_1.textLeft: The shrine maiden who was previously chosen@as a candidate of succession was also possessed.
Apparently, she lost her body to the Cursed God@within her and brought about disaster.

group_1.textRight: …One of the other candidates sacrificed herself@to exorcize the god, didn't she?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know exactly how it went, but I do know@that many of the potential successors were lost…

group_1.textRight: …And what do you do in the face of that?@You'd think you'd be better off giving up…

group_1.textLeft: But without any other candidates,@they've got no choice.
Besides…it's a hard demand from the main@shrine itself.

group_1.textRight: The main shrine…@You mean it's directly from Queen Himiko?

group_1.textLeft: I can't say exactly…@Us nobodies aren't in the know like that.
*...Sigh* Forget about all that.@Man, is it ever hot…

group_1.narration: ―Toyo―@Th-the heck does this mean…?!@The way this crack runs…
―Toyo―@Ahh…yeah, I remember now!@Just like what Gramma said…!
―Toyo―@It's the same crack that appeared on the day@Grampa first told Gramma he loved her…!
―Toyo―@I've been doing fortune-telling for a long time now,@but it's my first time actually seeing this…
―Toyo―@...It's a sign something good's gonna happen today.
―Grandpa―@Queen Himiko of Yamatai has summoned you!
